price: Ka sε: “Moahunu, sε N’asotwee no ba mo so adekyeε (berɛ mu) anaasε anadwo (berɛ mu) a, emu deε εwͻ hen na abͻneεfoͻ no repre ho no?”
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَتَىٰكُمۡ عَذَابُهُۥ بَيَٰتًا أَوۡ نَهَارٗا مَّاذَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُ مِنۡهُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in atākum ʿadhābuhu bayātan aw nahāran mādhā yastaʿjilu min'hu al-muj'rimūna
